data.message: Facebook I need help I can't change passwords edit anything on my page think I been hacked

replies.message: Hi Caleb. If your account was taken over by someone else, please report it to us: http://bit.ly/2iVtzlJ. You can learn how to regain access to your account here: http://bit.ly/2hwPHWT. Additionally, we have several helpful tools you can use to better secure your account and recognize attempts to compromise your information. Lastly, you can learn to log out of all active sessions here: http://bit.ly/2yz6v2U. To learn more about these tools and how to keep your account safe, visit Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2iSili7. -Tenaya

We're sorry to hear that, Caleb. If your account has been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2ATiDxa. You can also find detailed information about the tools and extra security features you can use to help keep your account secure on Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2AMqwnd. -Anna

Hi Granit. Verification is rolling out slowly and may not be available to you yet. However, you can see if your Page is eligible for verification by following these instructions: http://bit.ly/2inJWIt. We hope this helps! -Tenaya
